EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Freddie the F16?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> DEFENSE l UPGRADES HOW'S YOUR FREDDIE? Do you have a Freddie The F16 in need of some love? Honeywell is here to help! With several upgrade solutions available on the F16 that will keep Freddie supporting your missions and flying longer. Find out more by signing up today.
CLICK HERE TO HELP FREDDIE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FreddieTheF16.html]]>
